parameters.description: Onboard velocity moment (Inst. Coords), assuming 100% protons

parameters.description: Onboard velocity moment (MSO [Mars-Sun Orbit] Coords), assuming 100% protons

parameters.name: temperature
parameters.description: Onboard temperature moment (Inst. Coords), assuming 100% protons

parameters.name: temperature_mso
parameters.description: Onboard temperature moment (MSO [Mars-Sun Orbit] Coords), assuming 100% protons

parameters.name: atten_state
parameters.description: Attenuator state, 1 = open, 2 = closed, 3 = cover closed

parameters.name: telem_mode
parameters.description: Telemetry Mode: 1 = Sheath, 0 = Solar Wind

parameters.name: quality_flag
parameters.description: Quality Flag: 0 = bad, 1 = good

parameters.name: decom_flag
parameters.description: Decommutation Flag: 0 = uncertain mode/attenuator flags, 1 = known mode/attenuator flags

parameters.description: Raw Instrument Counts (as spectrogram)

parameters.description: ---> Raw Instrument Counts (as time series).

parameters.description: Attenuator state, 1 = open, 2 = closed, 3 = cover closed

parameters.description: Number of Accumulations Summed

parameters.description: Decommutation Flag: 0 = uncertain mode/attenuator flags, 1 = known mode/attenuator flags
